title: The Drunkard's reformation
creator_contributor_role: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcoholism
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Philosophy, Moral
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Philosophy, Moral
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social problems in motion pictures
description: An alcoholic father takes time to reflect when he, accompanied by his child, is confronted with a stage performance preaching the evils of drinking. Cast includes Arthur V. Johnson, Linda Arvidson, Adele DeGarde, Charles Avery, Florence Lawrence, Mack Sennett, Harry Solter. Silent film with English intertitles.
